comments:

Close the view and reopen it, the exception doesn't reproduce again.

Can you provide any more information on any steps/configurations that might be important.  Are you able to reproduce at all?  I have never seen this NPE before and from simple inspection, I can't figure out why that line of code is failing.
I'm sorry but it occured by accident and I cannot reproduce it any more.

Yueqian, what is the ID of the build you are using?  Check under Help > About Eclipse SDK? 

Thanks.

I suspect this is a rare side effect of bug 141292, where PDECore's initialization can get a little messed up.  It has been fixed.

Reopen if it occurs in 3.2.1 or 3.3M2.  Thanks.
